item.title: Create logo for R package UCSCXenaTools with hexSticker
item.description: A few days ago, I asked Tyler about how did he create the logo of R package exoplanets. Figure 1: logo of R package exoplanets I really love this logo because it is very simple and elegant. He told me he used a software called omnigraffle to make the logos. I tried learning this software and still did not know how to use it to create a nice logo because I am not good at creating beautiful things.
